types:
<method name="parseFile" return="{ namespace: string, types: !Array, imports: !Array }"> The content of the `xml` file. Namespace to ignore in types and properties.
Parses the types.xml file. Looks for ``, ``, `` and `` elements and extracts their properties, functions and arguments.
<arg type="!Array" name="allTypes"> All types that can be linked.
The type or parsed type that should be serialised.
Options for linking.
Gets links for markdown. Iterates through the types to find referenced ones, and returns a string which contains a link to it.
